snippet.title: Front Mission Evolved - Wanzer Pack 3 DLC Trailer | HD
snippet.description:
See the new Wanzers offered in Wanzer Pack 3 for Front Mission Evolved.

DOWNLOAD the DLC from Xbox Marketplace: http://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Front-Mission-Evolved-Wanzer-Pack-3/e19124bd-dc61-454d-98ed-d2d382035bfc?cid=SLink
ORDER TODAY: Front Mission Evolved - http://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B003QPGNDY?ie=UTF8&tag=xboxviewtv-21&linkCode=as2&camp=1638&creative=6742&creativeASIN=B003QPGNDY

Developer: Double Helix
Release Date: Sep 28, 2010(Game) - Nov 9, 2010(DLC)
Genre: Shooter, Third-Person, Action
Platform: Xbox 360, PS3, PC
Publisher: Square Enix
